structure.unit: LICENSING OF MOTOR VEHICLES, OPERATORS, AND TRAILERS

law.catch_line: Registration fees for portion of year.
law.text: If a person becomes the owner of a trailer, semitrailer, or recreational vehicle after April 1 of any year, and for that reason registers for only part of a year, the registration fee shall be as many twelfths of the annual fee as there are unexpired months in the registration year.
law.history: Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 42, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 395, sec. 16, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 139, sec. 18, effective January 1, 1967. -- Created 1956 (2nd Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 6, sec. 8.
